amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to strike the bill's provisions that limit states' ability to enact right-to-work laws.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the bill's provisions that limit states' ability to enact right-to-work laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 235 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Meadows.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 235 (Roll no. 46).
